post.description:
Create a memory by analyzing the provided input data.

Set `infer` to `false` to skip inference and store the memory verbatim.

Memory inference is asynchronous. The response contains a job ID which can be used to track the status of the memory creation.

get.description:
Search through memories using a query string.

Uses hybrid semantic and keyword-based search with a recency bias to find relevant memories. Results are sorted by relevance and include a relevance score (higher is better).
